p: Epidemiological mathematical models produce the outcome of the selection of data fed into them and can support the claims researchers find useful. This will be shown also below in the presentation of studies where scientists using the same mathematical model, the so-called Reedâ€“Frost (SIR) mathematical epidemiological model, claim to prove the validity of two entirely different and incompatible alternative theories on the microbiological identity and epidemiological dynamics of the Black Death and historical plague epidemics.
